comments.body: Will this work with Debug build?
No need to disable /O2 and enable /O1 for debug build, since optimisation is disabled by default (/Od) when building Debug libraries

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@  message("Disabling MSVC /O2 optimization for Win32")
  set(CompFlags
    CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE
    CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_MINSIZEREL
    CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO

comments.body:
TFL_COMPILE_LIBRARY controls TFL_CAPI_EXPORT macro expansion, which is needed in Windows DLL build.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/221c2d5d5391606a42abee95b39b9814a8af802e/tensorflow/lite/c/c_api_types.h#L28-L42

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +56,60 @@if (TFLITE_C_BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
  if (WIN32)
    target_compile_definitions(tensorflowlite_c PRIVATE TFL_COMPILE_LIBRARY)
  elseif (APPLE)
    target_link_options(tensorflowlite_c PRIVATE "-Wl,-exported_symbols_list,${TENSORFLOW_SOURCE_DIR}/tensorflow/lite/c/exported_symbols.lds")
